description: Developer Carlo Vogelsang created the Galaxy Music System, also called the Galaxy Sound System, while contracted with Epic Games. Epic used Galaxy in Unreal, the first version of Unreal Tournament, and other video games, including Jazz Jackrabbit 2.
The version of Galaxy used in Jazz Jackrabbit 2 plays audio modules saved as J2B files. These J2B files are .S3M or .IT files that have been encrypted and optimized specifically for use with Galaxy.
